title: Why China’s Small Merchants Are Checking Out of Mega Shopping Fests
excerpt: Frustrated by high return rates and dwindling profits, small merchants are questioning the long-term viability of discount-driven shopping festivals. Some are even opting out and returning to more traditional business models.

title: China’s Digital Landscape in 2020 | KAWO 科握
excerpt: A comprehensive overview of the China social media landscape in 2020 - know how to navigate and help marketing teams achieve success in Chinese social!
